blogPost.excerpt: A platform to streamline clinical operations for behavioral health clinics -- including scheduling, patient management, session notes, and more -- so clinics can get back to what really matters: treating their patients. Launching in the autism space.
blogPost.body: A platform to streamline clinical operations for behavioral health clinics -- including scheduling, patient management, session notes, and more -- so clinics can get back to what really matters: treating their patients. Launching in the autism space.
blogPost.title: Juniper - Practice management platform for behavioral health
blogPost.author: Lindsay Amos

localize.description: 一个为行为健康诊所简化临床操作的平台--包括日程安排、患者管理、疗程记录等--因此诊所可以回到真正重要的事情上：治疗他们的患者。在自闭症领域推出。
localize.tagline: 行为健康实践管理平台

localize.description: 一個爲行爲健康診所簡化臨牀操作的平臺--包括日程安排、患者管理、療程記錄等--因此診所可以回到真正重要的事情上：治療他們的患者。在自閉症領域推出。
localize.tagline: 行爲健康實踐管理平臺

previous.excerpt: Decentraland is a decentralized virtual reality platform powered by the Ethereum blockchain. Within the Decentraland platform, users can create, experience, and monetize their content and applications.
previous.title: Decentraland 2.0 - Explore a virtual world owned by its users

localize.description: Decentraland是一个由Ethereum区块链驱动的去中心化虚拟现实平台。在Decentraland平台内，用户可以创建、体验和货币化他们的内容和应用。
localize.tagline: 探索一个属于用户的虚拟世界

localize.description: Decentraland是一個由Ethereum區塊鏈驅動的去中心化虛擬現實平臺。在Decentraland平臺內，用戶可以創建、體驗和貨幣化他們的內容和應用。
localize.tagline: 探索一個屬於用戶的虛擬世界
